template_input_params.name: aws_region
template_input_params.label: AWS Region
template_input_params.description: AWS region to deploy your ICP cluster nodes. For an HA installation, the AWS selected region should have at least 3 availability zones.

template_input_params.name: azs
template_input_params.label: Availability Zones
template_input_params.description: The availability zone letter identifier in the above selected region. For high availability should have at least 3 availability zones. Setting to a single availability zone will disable high availability and not provision EFS, in this case, reduce the number of master and proxy nodes to 1

template_input_params.name: key_name
template_input_params.label: Key Name
template_input_params.description: Name of the EC2 key pair.

template_input_params.name: privatekey
template_input_params.label: Private Key
template_input_params.description: Base64 encoded private key file contents of the EC2 key pair.
template_input_params.regexdesc: Enter a valid base64 encoded text. Base64 encoded text contains alphanumeric characters and equals symbol as padding.

template_input_params.name: vpcname
template_input_params.label: VPC Name
template_input_params.description: AWS VPC Name prefix. This value is used to prefix the VPC created for ICP nodes.

template_input_params.name: cidr
template_input_params.label: VPC CIDR block
template_input_params.description: AWS VPC CIDR block. This is the primary CIDR block for your ICP node VPC.

template_input_params.name: subnetname
template_input_params.label: Subnet Name
template_input_params.description: Subnet name prefix for public and private subnets used by ICP nodes.

template_input_params.name: subnet_cidrs
template_input_params.label: Private Subnet CIDRs
template_input_params.description: List of subnet CIDRs. Total number of CIDR entry must match the number of availability zone provided above. A CIDR value is used in the creation of a private subnet in an availability zone for the worker nodes.

template_input_params.name: pub_subnet_cidrs
template_input_params.label: Public Subnet CIDRs
template_input_params.description: List of subnet CIDRs. Total number of CIDR entry must match the number of availability zone provided above. A CIDR value is used in the creation of a public subnet in an availability zone for the proxy and management nodes.

template_input_params.name: private_domain
template_input_params.label: Private Domain
template_input_params.description: Private domain name that is used to create route53 name.

template_input_params.name: ami
template_input_params.label: Amazon Machine Image (AMI-ID)
template_input_params.description: Default Amazon Machine Image ID that will be used if AMI ID for individual node is not provided.

template_input_params.name: bastion
template_input_params.label: Bastion Node
template_input_params.description: Bastion host that you can use to ssh into ICP cluster nodes. Can be used for debugging purpose.

template_input_params.name: master
template_input_params.label: Master Node
template_input_params.description: Master node details. Each master node will be created in a different AZS. Number of AZS, public subnet and private subnet must match the number of master node.

template_input_params.name: proxy
template_input_params.label: Proxy Node
template_input_params.description: Proxy node details. Each proxy node will be created in a different AZS. Number of AZS, public subnet and private subnet must match the number of proxy node.

template_input_params.name: management
template_input_params.label: Management Node
template_input_params.description: Management node details. Each management node will be created in a different AZS. Number of AZS, public subnet and private subnet must match the number of management node.

template_input_params.name: worker
template_input_params.label: Worker Node
template_input_params.description: Worker node details. Each worker node will be created in a different AZS. Number of AZS, public subnet and private subnet must match the number of worker node.

template_input_params.name: va
template_input_params.label: Vulnerability Advisor Node
template_input_params.description: Vulnerability Advisor node details. Each VA node will be created in a different AZS. Number of AZS, public subnet and private subnet must match the number of VA node.

template_input_params.name: instance_name
template_input_params.label: Cluster Name
template_input_params.description: ICP Cluster Name
template_input_params.regexdesc: Cluster name can have lower case alphabets, numbers and dash. Must start with lower case alphabet and end with alpha-numeric character. Maximum length is 63 characters.

template_input_params.name: icppassword
template_input_params.label: ICP Password
template_input_params.description: ICP user password

template_input_params.name: docker_package_location
template_input_params.label: Docker Package Location
template_input_params.description: Docker package location is required when installing ICP EE on RedHat. Package is expected in AWS s3 bucket. Prefix the location string with protocol s3://.

template_input_params.name: image_location
template_input_params.label: ICP EE Image Location
template_input_params.description: Image location of ICP EE. Package is expected in AWS s3 bucket. Prefix the location string with s3://.

template_input_params.name: icp_inception_image
template_input_params.label: ICP Inception Image
template_input_params.description: Name of the bootstrap installation image.

template_output_params.name: icp_klusterlet_dns
template_output_params.label: Host Name for klusterlet Prometheus ingress rule
template_output_params.description: Use this host name as input to the klusterlet Prometheus ingress hostname.

template_output_params.name: vm_os_private_key
template_output_params.description: Private SSH key to use while configuring the IBM Cloud Private Boot Node (base64 encoded)
template_output_params.label: Boot Master Node User Private SSH Key (base64 encoded)

template_output_params.name: connection_name
template_output_params.label: ICP Cloud Connection Name
template_output_params.description: ICP cloud connection name that can be used in other templates to connect to ICP cluster.
